en: Narrator: Mr Zebra, the postman, is delivering a parcel to Peppa's house.
cn: 旁白：斑马先生邮递员正在给佩奇家送包裹。

en: Mr Zebra: Parcel for you, Mr Pig.
cn: 斑马先生：猪先生，你的包裹。

en: Daddy Pig: Thank you, Mr Zebra. Goodbye.
cn: 猪爸爸：谢谢你，斑马先生。再见。

en: Daddy Pig: Look. I just got a parcel in the post. Can anyone guess what's inside?
cn: 猪爸爸：看，我刚收到一个包裹。谁能猜猜里面是什么？

examples.en: Can anyone guess what this is?
examples.cn: 谁能猜猜这是什么？

examples.en: Can anyone guess how much this costs?
examples.cn: 谁能猜猜这个多少钱？

en: George: Dinosaur.
cn: 乔治：恐龙。

en: Peppa Pig: Oh, George. You always say 'dinosaur' for everything.
cn: 佩奇：哦，乔治，你什么都说是恐龙。

en: Daddy Pig: The parcel is far too small to have a dinosaur inside.
cn: 猪爸爸：这个包裹太小了，装不下恐龙。

sentence.en: far too small to have a dinosaur inside

examples.en: This box is far too small to fit the book inside.
examples.cn: 这个盒子太小了，放不下书。

examples.en: The bag is far too small to carry all my toys.
examples.cn: 这个包太小了，装不下我所有的玩具。

en: Peppa Pig: Hmm... I think it's a... a new toy.
cn: 佩奇：嗯……我觉得是……一个新玩具。

en: Daddy Pig: You're very close.
cn: 猪爸爸：你猜得很接近了。

en: Mummy Pig: I know what it is. Your new camera. A new toy for Daddy Pig.
cn: 猪妈妈：我知道是什么了。你的新相机。是猪爸爸的新玩具。

en: Daddy Pig: That's right! It's a movie camera. We can make movies with it and watch them on our television.
cn: 猪爸爸：没错！是摄像机。我们可以用它拍电影，然后在电视上看。

sentence.en: We can make movies with it and watch them on our television.
sentence.cn: 我们可以用它拍电影，然后在电视上看。

examples.en: We can make cookies with it and eat them later.
examples.cn: 我们可以用它做饼干，然后待会儿吃。

examples.en: We can play games with it and have fun.
examples.cn: 我们可以用它玩游戏，玩得开心。

en: Peppa Pig: Can I use it first, Daddy?
cn: 佩奇：爸爸，我能先用吗？

en: Daddy Pig: It's a bit too difficult for children to use. Even I need to read the instructions. Hmm... It's a bit harder than I thought.
cn: 猪爸爸：这个对小朋友来说有点难。连我都得看看说明书。嗯……比我想的难。

sentence.en: It's a bit harder than I thought.

examples.en: This puzzle is a bit harder than I thought.
examples.cn: 这个拼图比我想的难。

examples.en: The exam was a bit harder than I thought.
examples.cn: 考试比我想的难。

en: Peppa Pig: Suzy Sheep's mummy has a movie camera. She switches it on like this.
cn: 佩奇：苏茜羊的妈妈有摄像机。她是这样打开的。

en: Daddy Pig: Oh. Well done, Peppa.
cn: 猪爸爸：哦，干得好，佩奇。

en: Camera: Thank you for purchasing the Movie 3000. I am eager and ready to shoot your first movie.
cn: 摄像机：感谢您购买Movie 3000。我已准备好拍摄您的第一部电影。

en: Mummy Pig: Is there a way to turn that voice off?
cn: 猪妈妈：有办法关掉那个声音吗？

sentence.en: Is there a way to turn that voice off?
sentence.cn: 有办法关掉那个声音吗？

examples.en: Is there a way to fix this?
examples.cn: 有办法修好这个吗？

examples.en: Is there a way to make it quieter?
examples.cn: 有办法让它安静点吗？

en: Daddy Pig: I'm not sure.
cn: 猪爸爸：我不确定。

en: Camera: Thank you for purchasing the Movie 3000.
cn: 摄像机：感谢您购买Movie 3000。

sentence.en: Thank you for purchasing the Movie 3000.

examples.en: Thank you for purchasing the new phone.
examples.cn: 感谢您购买新手机。

examples.en: Thank you for purchasing the latest game.
examples.cn: 感谢您购买最新的游戏。

en: Peppa Pig: On Suzy's camera, you just press this button to stop it talking.
cn: 佩奇：苏茜的摄像机只要按这个按钮就不说话了。

sentence.en: On Suzy's camera, you just press this button to stop it talking.
sentence.cn: 苏茜的摄像机只要按这个按钮就不说话了。

examples.en: On my tablet, you just tap this icon to turn it off.
examples.cn: 在我的平板上，只需点击这个图标即可关闭。

examples.en: On the remote, you just press this button to mute the sound.
examples.cn: 在遥控器上，只需按这个按钮即可静音。

en: Camera: Thank you for purchasing...
cn: 摄像机：感谢您购买……

en: Peppa Pig: Now it won't talk anymore.
cn: 佩奇：现在它不会再说话了。

examples.en: Now it won't make any noise.
examples.cn: 现在它不会发出任何声音。

examples.en: Now it won't bother us.
examples.cn: 现在它不会打扰我们了。

en: Mummy Pig: Well done, Peppa.
cn: 猪妈妈：干得好，佩奇。

en: Daddy Pig: What shall I film first?
cn: 猪爸爸：我先拍什么好呢？

examples.en: What shall I cook for dinner?
examples.cn: 我晚餐该做什么？

examples.en: What shall I wear today?
examples.cn: 我今天该穿什么？

en: Peppa Pig: Film me!
cn: 佩奇：拍我！

en: Daddy Pig: OK, Peppa.
cn: 猪爸爸：好的，佩奇。

en: Peppa Pig: Hello. I'm Peppa Pig.
cn: 佩奇：大家好，我是佩奇猪。

en: Daddy Pig: Come on, everyone.
cn: 猪爸爸：大家快来。

en: Peppa Pig: (on camera) Hello. I'm Peppa Pig.
cn: 佩奇（在摄像机里）：大家好，我是佩奇猪。

en: Peppa Pig: Again! Again!
cn: 佩奇：再来一次！再来一次！

en: Daddy Pig: OK.
cn: 猪爸爸：好。

en: Peppa Pig: (on camera) Hello! I'm Peppa Pig.
cn: 佩奇（在摄像机里）：大家好！我是佩奇猪。

en: Peppa Pig: Again!
cn: 佩奇：再来一次！

en: Peppa Pig: (on camera) Hello. I'm Peppa Pig.
cn: 佩奇（在摄像机里）：大家好，我是佩奇猪。

en: Peppa Pig: Again! Again!
cn: 佩奇：再来一次！再来一次！

en: Daddy Pig: Maybe we should film something new.
cn: 猪爸爸：也许我们该拍点新东西了。

sentence.en: Maybe we should film something new.
sentence.cn: 也许我们该拍点新东西了。

examples.en: Maybe we should try a different angle.
examples.cn: 也许我们该换个角度拍。

examples.en: Maybe we should add some special effects.
examples.cn: 也许我们该加点特效。

en: Mummy Pig: I know! Daddy Pig must leave the room and we'll make a movie to show him.
cn: 猪妈妈：我有主意了！猪爸爸要离开房间，我们来拍一部电影给他看。

en: Peppa Pig: This way!
cn: 佩奇：这边！

en: Narrator: Daddy Pig has to wait in the kitchen while Mummy Pig, Peppa and George make a secret movie.
cn: 旁白：猪爸爸要在厨房等着，猪妈妈、佩奇和乔治要拍一部秘密电影。

sentence.en: Daddy Pig has to wait in the kitchen while Mummy Pig, Peppa and George make a secret movie.
sentence.cn: 猪爸爸要在厨房等着，猪妈妈、佩奇和乔治要拍一部秘密电影。

examples.en: The children have to wait in the garden while the adults prepare dinner.
examples.cn: 孩子们要在花园等着，等大人们准备好晚餐。

examples.en: She has to wait in line while her friends buy tickets.
examples.cn: 她要在队伍里等着，等朋友们买票。

en: Mummy Pig: No peeking, Daddy Pig. We all have to do something. George, do you want to go first?
cn: 猪妈妈：猪爸爸，不许偷看。我们每个人都要表演。乔治，你想先来吗？

en: Daddy Pig: Are you ready? Can I come in and see the movie?
cn: 猪爸爸：你们准备好了吗？我能进来看电影了吗？

points.en: come in and see the movie

en: Mummy Pig: Finished! You can come in now! George has made a movie and so has Peppa.
cn: 猪妈妈：好了！你可以进来了！乔治拍了一部电影，佩奇也拍了。

sentence.en: George has made a movie and so has Peppa.
sentence.cn: 乔治拍了一部电影，佩奇也拍了。

examples.en: John has made a cake and so has Mary.
examples.cn: 约翰做了一个蛋糕，玛丽也做了。

examples.en: Tom has finished his homework and so has Lucy.
examples.cn: 汤姆完成了作业，露西也完成了。

en: Daddy Pig: Let's see George's movie first.
cn: 猪爸爸：我们先看乔治的电影。

en: George: (on camera) Dinosaur! Grrrrr!
cn: 乔治（在摄像机里）：恐龙！嗷呜！

en: Peppa Pig: George is pretending to be a dinosaur.
cn: 佩奇：乔治在假装恐龙。

sentence.en: George is pretending to be a dinosaur.

examples.en: She is pretending to be a princess.
examples.cn: 她在假装公主。

examples.en: They are pretending to be superheroes.
examples.cn: 他们在假装超级英雄。

en: George: (on camera) Grrr!
cn: 乔治（在摄像机里）：嗷呜！

en: Daddy Pig: That's a very scary dinosaur.
cn: 猪爸爸：那是一只很吓人的恐龙。

en: Narrator: Oh dear, George is frightened.
cn: 旁白：哦，糟糕，乔治被吓到了。

en: Mummy Pig: Don't be frightened, George. That's not a real dinosaur on TV. It's you.
cn: 猪妈妈：别害怕，乔治。电视上不是恐龙，是你自己。

en: George: Grrrrr! Dinosaur!
cn: 乔治：嗷呜！恐龙！

en: Mummy Pig: Now, let's see Peppa's movie.
cn: 猪妈妈：现在我们来看佩奇的电影。

en: Peppa Pig: (on camera) Ho, ho, ho.
cn: 佩奇（在摄像机里）：哼哼哼。

en: Daddy Pig: Who is that meant to be?
cn: 猪爸爸：那是谁啊？

sentence.en: Who is that meant to be?

examples.en: Who is that meant to be in the story?
examples.cn: 故事里那个人是谁？

examples.en: Who is that meant to be in the picture?
examples.cn: 图片里那个人是谁？

en: Peppa Pig: (on camera) I am Daddy Pig! Ho, ho, ho.
cn: 佩奇（在摄像机里）：我是猪爸爸！哼哼哼。

en: Daddy Pig: I see.
cn: 猪爸爸：我明白了。

en: Peppa Pig: (on camera) My tummy is very big because I eat a lot of cookies.
cn: 佩奇（在摄像机里）：我的肚子很大，因为我吃了很多饼干。

sentence.en: My tummy is very big because I eat a lot of cookies.
sentence.cn: 我的肚子很大，因为我吃了很多饼干。

examples.en: My backpack is very heavy because I have a lot of books.
examples.cn: 我的背包很重，因为我有很多书。

examples.en: My room is very messy because I have too many toys.
examples.cn: 我的房间很乱，因为我有太多玩具。

en: Daddy Pig: My tummy is not big! But it is true that I like cookies.
cn: 猪爸爸：我的肚子不大！不过我确实喜欢吃饼干。

sentence.en: My tummy is not big! But it is true that I like cookies.
sentence.cn: 我的肚子不大！不过我确实喜欢吃饼干。

examples.en: My car is not fast! But it is true that I like driving.
examples.cn: 我的车不快！不过我确实喜欢开车。

examples.en: My house is not big! But it is true that I love my home.
examples.cn: 我的房子不大！不过我确实爱我的家。

en: Peppa Pig: And the more you eat, the bigger your tummy gets!
cn: 佩奇：你吃得越多，肚子就越大！

sentence.en: And the more you eat, the bigger your tummy gets!
sentence.cn: 你吃得越多，肚子就越大！

examples.en: And the more you practice, the better you get!
examples.cn: 你练习得越多，变得就越好！

examples.en: And the more you read, the more knowledge you gain!
examples.cn: 你阅读得越多，获得的知识就越多！

en: Daddy Pig: OK, what's next?
cn: 猪爸爸：好吧，接下来是什么？

en: Peppa Pig: This is my sweet little brother George. This is Mummy Pig. This is me.
cn: 佩奇：这是我可爱的弟弟乔治。这是猪妈妈。这是我。

en: Daddy Pig: And this is the real Daddy Pig.
cn: 猪爸爸：这才是真正的猪爸爸。
